title: The Engineering of agreement. What would you say?
creator_credit: Jodie Copelan, Leon S. Gold and Roundtable Productions
brief_description: Obtaining the agreement of others is vital in the everyday work situation and in such fields as sales; the value of considering the other person’s point of view and of establishing two way communication. Two real-life interviews show the right and wrong approaches, while a trailer provides opportunities for discussing common difficulties.
